name: @chillandchat/bot-utility
description: This is the official Chill&chat bot utility CLI, this CLI allows you to create bots and interact with the bot account.
author: Alvin Cheng <eventide1029@gmail.com>

scripts.build: echo 'Building...' && cp -a ./src/ ./build/tmp && node build.js && tsc && echo 'Done!'
scripts.create-bin: echo 'Building binary files...' && pkg ./build/js/index.js --output bot-utility -t node14-macos,node12-linux,node14-linux,node14-win && echo 'Done!'
